lead_paragraph: A fully renovated 1905 townhouse on a prime, tree-lined street in Greenwich Village was the sale of the week.
snippet: A fully renovated 1905 townhouse on a prime, tree-lined street in Greenwich Village was the sale of the week.

headline.main: Greenwich Village Townhouse Flipped for $23.3 Million

abstract: Big Ticket column; gut-renovated 1905 Greek Revival townhouse at 146 Waverly Place in Greenwich Village is New York City's highest residential sale of week, closing at $23,282,932.60.
